thread.title: CHAN: Home Eagles To Host Burkina On Saturday, Not Sunday
thread.title_full: CHAN: Home Eagles To Host Burkina On Saturday, Not Sunday

author: Nurudeen Obalola
title: CHAN: Home Eagles To Host Burkina On Saturday, Not Sunday
text:
Headlines 
By Sab Osuji: 
The Championship for African Nations qualifier between the Super Eagles and Stallions of Burkina Faso will now hold on Saturday, Completesportsnigeria.com can report. 
The match was originally slated for Sunday at Adokiye Amiesimaka Sports Complex, Port Harcourt. 
The venue however remains unchanged. 
Completesportsnigeria.com understands the shift in date was at the instance of CAF who has consequently communicated it to the Nigeria Football Federation. 
Ademola Olajire, Head of Media, Nigeria Football Federation confirmed the shift in date for the match but did not give further details. 
“Yes, the match has been shifted slightly. 
“It will now be played on Saturday at the same venue,” Olajire said. 
The slight shift in date has forced NFF to adjust their arrangement more so with the Stallions expected to arrive in Nigeria on Thursday. 
The Super Eagles were billed to round up their preparation for the match with a friendly game un Thursday but that tune-up game has been rescheduled for Wednesday.
